p: We set the threshold between probabilities considered in the niche and out of the niche at 75% for illustration purposes; however, we recognize that wide variability existed in how much failure past societies could tolerate. We have seen that, at Jiangzhai, they were able to tolerate relatively little failure; however, at sites in Kazakhstan and Korea, the ability to deal with crop failure (not only through storage but also through crop diversification and investment in trade and other economic strategies like pastoralism) was different throughout Asia.
